Key Match Events: Evin Lewis scored an unbeaten 102 off 61 balls, hitting a straight six to bring up the winning runs and his fifth ODI century.
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies' Sherfane Rutherford and Evin Lewis celebrated their win over Sri Lanka.
West Indies' Sherfane Rutherford celebrated his fifty runs during the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A five-hour rain delay reduced the match to 23 overs per side.
